bill.summary: 6/23/1994--Introduced. Amends the Defense Economic Adjustment, Diversification, Conversion, and Stabilization Act of 1990 to require the Economic Development Administration, in making economic adjustment assistance available under such Act, to give priority to communities substantially and seriously affected by the closure or realignment of a military installation or the curtailment, completion, elimination, or realignment of a major defense contract or subcontract.
